#| label: disease-burden-109-trillion
#| fig-cap: "Disease Burden: The Real Killer ($109 Trillion)"

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import sys
from pathlib import Path

# Ensure project root is in path
sys.path.insert(0, str(Path.cwd()))


import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from brain.charts._chart_style import (
    setup_chart_style, add_watermark, clean_spines,
    COLOR_BLACK, COLOR_RED, COLOR_WHITE
)

# Setup neobrutalist styling
setup_chart_style(style='light', dpi=150)

# Create chart showing all three for final comparison
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(16, 10))

# Data - all three costs for perspective
categories = ['Military\n(Admitted)', 'War\n(True Cost)', 'DISEASE\nBURDEN']
values = [2.7, 9.7, 109]  # In trillions
colors = ['#FFFF00', '#FFA500', '#FF0000']  # Yellow to orange to red

# Bars - linear scale to show true disparity
bars = ax.bar(categories, values, color=colors,
              edgecolor=COLOR_BLACK, linewidth=4, width=0.7)

# Add value labels
for i, (bar, value) in enumerate(zip(bars, values)):
    height = bar.get_height()
    if i < 2:  # Small bars - label above
        ax.text(bar.get_x() + bar.get_width()/2., height + 2,
                f'${value}T', ha='center', va='bottom',
                color=COLOR_BLACK, fontsize=24, fontweight='bold')
    else:  # Massive bar - label inside
        ax.text(bar.get_x() + bar.get_width()/2., height * 0.5,
                f'$109\nTRILLION', ha='center', va='center',
                color=COLOR_WHITE, fontsize=48, fontweight='bold')

# Add multipliers showing escalation
ax.text(0.5, 6, '3.6X', ha='center', fontsize=20,
        color=COLOR_RED, fontweight='bold')
ax.text(1.5, 55, '11.2X', ha='center', fontsize=32,
        color=COLOR_RED, fontweight='bold')

# The shocking comparison
ax.text(2, 90, 'DISEASE IS THE\nREAL APOCALYPSE', ha='center', va='center',
        fontsize=24, color=COLOR_RED, fontweight='bold',
        bbox=dict(boxstyle='round', facecolor='yellow', edgecolor=COLOR_BLACK, linewidth=4))

# Formatting - linear scale shows the truth
ax.set_ylim(0, 120)
ax.set_ylabel('TRILLIONS PER YEAR', fontsize=20, color=COLOR_BLACK, fontweight='bold')
ax.tick_params(colors=COLOR_BLACK, labelsize=16)

# Brutal borders
for spine in ax.spines.values():
    spine.set_color(COLOR_BLACK)
    spine.set_linewidth(4)

plt.title('THE $109 TRILLION DISEASE BURDEN DWARFS WAR',
          fontsize=28, color=COLOR_BLACK, pad=20, fontweight='bold')

# Add watermark
add_watermark(fig)

# Save the figure
plt.savefig('brain/charts/disease-burden-109-trillion.png',
            dpi=300, bbox_inches='tight', facecolor='white')
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
